title: Platform Engineering: The DevOps You Productize
description: What is Platform Engineering? How is it different from DevOps or SRE? This article unpacks the role of platform teams, why they’re critical in modern software delivery, and how they bring together cloud, automation, and developer experience.
sitename: norbix.dev - The log of my journey through code & software systems architecture
cntitle: 平台工程：你产品化的 DevOps
cndescription: 什么是平台工程？它与 DevOps 或 SRE 有何不同？本文将阐述平台团队的角色，为什么它们在现代软件交付中至关重要，以及它们如何将云、自动化和开发者体验结合在一起。
